availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah W. Moore Whitaker in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on November 24, 1860. Father of Mary "Mollie" Whitaker.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 33A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Rockcastle County Marriages, Film 000907997.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 33407.
